title: Connection Timed out
body: I keep timing out during ranked during champ select and I have to deal with punishments

replies.body:
Connection timeouts are usually an indication that there are problems with your client maintaining a solid connection to the servers. To address this, I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if it resolves this issue.

Let me know if it did!
